overview: The world of football is very cut throat. Not only are the soccer players in fierce competition, but so are their wives and girlfriends (WAGS) who are hell bent on protecting their positions and the careers of their players.  Meet the Footballers Wives - Victoria Fuckham (Bobbie Star) married to David Fuckham, Paris Cliton (Amy Brooke) girlfriend of Cristian Donaldo and Leslie Trash (Carla Cox) wife of Randyaldo.  See these backstabbing bitches get what they deserve in this sex fueled ball game of blackmail, intrigue, scandal and ass breaking anal sex.
title: Private World Cup: Footballers' Wives
